thread.title: Justice Department Widens Wells Fargo Sales Investigation to Wealth Management

author: Emily Glazer
title: Justice Department Widens Wells Fargo Sales Investigation to Wealth Management

organizations.name: justice department widens wells fargo sales investigation to wealth management
justice department and securities and exchange commission

text:
A federal investigation into sales practices at Wells Fargo & Co. now includes the bank’s wealth-management business, extending the probe beyond the firm’s retail-banking unit where the problems originated, people familiar with the matter said.
The Justice Department and Securities and Exchange Commission are conducting the investigation into the wealth-management business, these people said.
